dialog: P1:Hi there! Do you have an appointment?
P1:Oh. That. Well, we are happy to lend our services to you. Let's all head there together!
P2:We don't know anything about anything, here at IT.
P2:On par with student inquiries, we Google everything.
P2:So no, we don't know anything about the death.
SELF:Standard analytics and whatnot. But I guess with the screen on sleep mode, you can't seen anything.
SELF:I don't think they have touched it for a while, though.
SELF:Warning: are you sure you want to leave this area?
